TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LanguageOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is not intended for public use and is used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.
